quotes: He spent eight years as Dean of Faculty of Science and Technology, Keio University (1993-2001)
then eight more years as President of the same university (2001-09)
In October 2011 he became President, Japan Society for the Promotion of Science
Chairperson of Association of Pacific Rim Universities (2008-09)
Member of the Science Council of Japan (2005-11)
President of the Information Processing Society of Japan (2005-07)
President of the Japanese Cognitive Science Society (1993-94)
Human-Robot Interaction: Our Experience Since 1991
